about_the_game:
Unleash the Hero Within!

Dive into Changer Seven, the exhilarating single player 3D Action-Adventure game that brings together fast-paced combat, stunning visuals, and a compelling narrative. Changer Seven introduces you to a thrilling world where you lead a young Super-Hero Squad through tag-team/assist-based combat to save humanity.

Armed with super sentai inspired powers and fighting their way through a world inspired by the vibrant culture and landscapes of Brazil, defeating each new villain, to learn more of the story and mysteries surrounding the Changer's tainted legacy.

CHANGER POWER!

Choose a Changer, use radical combos to defeat your opponents, and experience intense combats loaded with breathtaking action and outrageous hero abilities. Play as your favorite Changer and call the others to help whenever you need, in a dynamic tag team setup. Stay sharp as you face off against a new menace that threatens the city of Sunny Point transforming citizens into terrifying beings!

FEATURES

Changer Seven Party: Control you favorite Changer!
Tag-Team Battles: Call in characters as assists to help fight!
Take Down the Villains: Free different areas of the city from domination!
Fight their Goons: Hack and Slash the Baddies Down!
Side Quests: Explore the areas of the city and help its citizens!

name: Changer Seven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Single-Player Third-Person Action-Adventure game where a group of super-powered teenagers hack and slash through hordes of monsters with a fast-paced combat system based on tag-team and assists.
